snippet: In Tana French’s latest psychological chiller, an Irish detective must solve a set of vicious murders in a community where he and his family used to spend vacations.
abstract: Janet Maslin reviews book Broken Harbor by Tana French.
lead_paragraph: In Tana French’s latest psychological chiller, an Irish detective must solve a set of vicious murders in a community where he and his family used to spend vacations.

headline.main: A Trip Down Memory Lane Leads to a Dead End at a Grisly Crime Scene
headline.print_headline: A Trip Down Memory Lane Leads to a Dead End at a Grisly Crime Scene
